column4: Hi, in Fedora I had /etc/sysconfig/iptables file where I specified the iptables rules for my box, is there an equivalent in Ubuntu?
you want to configure the iptables manually?
well, yes, I mean, I know how to specify rules in the command line, but want to have a place where I have the rules when I reboot my box
can't help ya.  I run firestarter on my boxes for ubuntu
